alert.note: Alert for Lewis (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 25 at 2:03PM EDT until August 25 at 2:30PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wilmington has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... South central Lewis County in northeastern Kentucky... * Until 230 PM EDT. * At 203 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Triplett, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Harris and Emerson. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
